description: Delete a job production plan segment.
permissions: User must be allowed to delete the related job production plan; JobProductionPlanSegmentPolicy delegates to JobProductionPlanPolicy#destroy? (same requirements as update).
side_effects: Deletes the job production plan segment.
validation_notes: <id> argument is required. --confirm is required. Deletion is blocked if the segment has a related job production plan location, or if the plan is approved/submitted, cost codes are required, and this is the only segment requiring cost codes.
